remarks:
Lemma for ~ mul02 .  Zero times a real is zero.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.) 

---

 Zero times a real is zero.  Although we prove it as a corollary of ~ mul02 , the name is for consistency with the Metamath Proof Explorer which proves it before ~ mul02 .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
statement: mul02lem2 $p |- ( A e. RR -> ( 0 x. A ) = 0 ) $.
